summary: This document is a correspondence from the FBI New York office to the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, referencing an additional inquiry response. It appears to be part of ongoing information sharing or investigative follow-up related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the recipient or point of contact for the correspondence from the FBI New York office regarding an additional inquiry response.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The FBI New York office sent correspondence to the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services on October 6, 2021.
The document references an 'Additional Inquiry Response' suggesting follow-up to previous investigative requests.
Michael C. Green is identified as the Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services.
The document appears to be part of inter-agency communication regarding the Epstein case investigation.
